message: You're in your menstrual phase (day 3). Your body needs extra care and rest during this time. Your stress levels are elevated. Consider additional self-care measures. We've detected some unusual patterns that need attention.

track: Note mood changes and energy levels
Monitor mood changes throughout the day
treat: Schedule a check-in with your healthcare provider
Consider talking to a mental health professional

next_questions: How heavy is your flow today?
Are you experiencing any unusual pain?
How is your energy level compared to usual?
Have you tried any relaxation techniques?
rationale: Based on your current cycle phase (menstrual) and health state (stressed), your body is shedding the uterine lining and needs extra care. Stress can impact hormone balance and cycle regularity. Unusual patterns detected require closer monitoring. These recommendations are tailored to support your current phase and health state.
